channel.title: mangOH yellow Wi-Fi security
channel.description:
MangOH yellow have Wi-Fi-Bluetooth module . If customer will activate it, which security for Wi-Fi can customer use? Is it possible to use WEP/WPA? And do WP7702 for mangOh yellow already have these security protocol?
Note: I found the attached document for MangOH green with WP8548. But I did not find similar document for MangOH yellow with WP7702. So, I cannot check security protocol for MangOH yellow with WP7702 now. [4119378_mangOH-Green-Tutorial-Wi-Fi_r1.pdf|attachment](upload://uEmZg25JvqJm8UxvVuQkqWBUNjm.pdf) (939.0 KB)

item.title: mangOH yellow Wi-Fi security
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
does this help?

MangOH Yellow - WiFi on Startup mangOH Yellow
Zahid, All I’m really trying to do is get the MangOH Yellow to connect to my WiFi network on startup. I have been following this page: https://github.com/mangOH/mangOH/tree/master/linux_kernel_modules/cypwifi It is unclear to me what the best way to accomplish this is. I how does the legato wifi service know the SSID and password to use?
github.com

mangOH/linux_kernel_modules/cypwifi at master · mangOH/mangOH

master/linux_kernel_modules/cypwifi

Primary mangOH git repository. Contribute to mangOH/mangOH development by creating an account on GitHub.

item.title: mangOH yellow Wi-Fi security
item.dc:creator: takashishiina
item.description:
MangOH yellow have Wi-Fi-Bluetooth module .
If customer will activate it, which security for Wi-Fi can customer use?
Is it possible to use WEP/WPA?
And do WP7702 for mangOh yellow already have these security protocol?

Note:
I found the attached document for MangOH green with WP8548.
But I did not find similar document for MangOH yellow with WP7702.
So, I cannot check security protocol for MangOH yellow with WP7702 now.
4119378_mangOH-Green-Tutorial-Wi-Fi_r1.pdf (939.0 KB)
